Comment: *player complains they would have won if only the refs didn’t give the game to their opponent*  Shut up, hand leadership over to a younger generation, and be quiet. Comment: Finger pointing is not an *alternative policy*.  Not a single alternative proposal was made in that 94-second clip.  That is what turned me off in the 2024 election -- Harris constantly poopooed on Trump and asked for money.  I didn't see her say, "Mindraker, here are my ideas that will benefit YOU."
Author: Muenrabbit
